Room.Name: A Light Forest Trailhead
Room.Description: You stand at the trailhead of the vast forest, the clearing a bustling hub of activity. The ground is firm beneath your feet, packed hard from the countless footsteps of travelers who have passed this way. A wooden signpost rises from the earth, pointing the way ahead and marking the fork in the trail that splits off to the east towards the majestic city of Astoria. The towering walls and palisades of Astoria are visible on the horizon, their imposing height and the glint of steel from the West Gate lending an air of power and security to the city.

Exit.Description: You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The forest trail winds westwards through the trees.
The trees are quite tall considering most of them appear to be quite young. On one of the trees, crude letters forming the word "Haon-Dor" have been carved into the bark.

Room.Name: A Trail Through the Light Forest
Room.Description: You are traversing a winding path through the dense forest, with the trees towering overhead, filtering dappled light onto the forest floor. To your east, the trees begin to thin and you can see glimpses of the lush grasslands beyond, while to the west, the trail continues its winding journey deeper into the heart of the forest.

Exit.Description: The trail continues eastwards out of the forest.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The forest trail winds east-west through the trees.
The trees here are quite young and fresh. They seem to accommodate many kinds of birds, insects and other small animals.
Very cute little creatures, they seem to enjoy life.

Room.Name: A Trail Through the Light Forest
Room.Description: You are traversing a winding path through the dense forest, with the trees towering overhead, filtering dappled light onto the forest floor. To your east, the trees begin to thin and you can see glimpses of the lush grasslands beyond, while to the west, the trail continues its winding journey deeper into the heart of the forest.

Exit.Description: The trail continues eastwards through the young trees.
The small path leads south through the young trees.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards into the dense forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The forest trail winds east-west through the trees.
The young, slender trees look beautiful, their fresh, green leaves moving lightly in the wind.

Room.Name: A Trail Through the Light Forest
Room.Description: You are traversing a winding path through the dense forest, with the trees towering overhead, filtering dappled light onto the forest floor. To your east, the trees begin to thin and you can see glimpses of the lush grasslands beyond, while to the west, the trail continues its winding journey deeper into the heart of the forest.

Exit.Description: The trail continues eastwards to the younger part of the forest.
You see the narrow trail winding westwards through the dense forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The forest trail seems almost fragile compared to the massive trunks.
The dense crowns of the mature trees leave only a fraction of the sky to be seen through the leaves.

Room.Name: A Junction in the Forest Trail
Room.Description: You are traversing a winding path through the dense forest, with the trees towering overhead, filtering dappled light onto the forest floor. To your east, the trees begin to thin and you can see glimpses of the lush grasslands beyond, while to the west, the trail continues its winding journey deeper into the heart of the forest.

Exit.Description: The trail continues eastwards through the dense forest.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The narrow trail almost seems to disappear between the enormous trunks.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The forest trail seems almost fragile compared to the massive trunks.
The crowns of the old trees almost cut out all light.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues north and south.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: An intersection in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The forest gradually lightens to the east. Paths lead east, west and south.

Exit.Description: You can barely make out a clearing to the east.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: The forest clearing
Room.Description: You are in a clearing in the forest. Lots of fresh stumps of varying sizes protrude from the ground and heavy logs are stacked neatly in a big pile supported by stakes set into the ground. Paths lead north, east and west.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: Even though the logs have been chopped to shorter pieces, they are quite heavy as they are fresh and still filled with sap.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The stakes keep the logs from rolling down.
There are more stumps than logs and some of the stumps are partly covered in moss.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: Outside a small cabin in the forest
Room.Description: You are outside a small cabin built entirely from heavy logs. There is a wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south through the trees.

Exit.Description: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.
The small path leads south through the dense forest.
The small path leads west through the light forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks simple but comfortable and the slender trees make the whole place seem pretty idyllic. It's a cabin built from logs. Wooden logs, not system logs.
The path is probably used by the cabin's inhabitants.
The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.

Room.Name: Inside the cabin
Room.Description: You are inside a small one-room cabin made entirely from heavy logs. It is very sparsely furnished, containing only most basic housekeeping equipment, such as a bed, a chair and a table.

Exit.Description: The wooden door leads south.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is definitely not the most comfortable bed you have seen in your life.
It is made from oak and looks strong and sturdy.
A heavy table that doesn't even appear to rock.

Room.Name: A small path through the light forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the forest. The trees are tall and slender. Paths lead north and south.

Exit.Description: The path leads north through the young trees.
The path leads south through the young trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.

Room.Name: An intersection in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination. Paths lead north, east and south.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues east and west.

Exit.Description: The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: An intersection in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The forest gradually lightens to the north. Paths lead north, east and west.

Exit.Description: The path leads north to a lighter part of the forest.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues south and west.

Exit.Description: The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues north and south.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The forest seems to become lighter to the west. The path continues north and west.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.

Room.Name: An intersection in the light forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the forest. A path leads north to a small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense forest.

Exit.Description: The path leads north to a small, grassy field.
The path leads east to a dense part of the forest.
The path leads west to a dense part of the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The tall trees are young and slender, not much more than a hundred years or so.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The forest seems to become lighter to the east. The path continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues south and west.

Exit.Description: The small path leads south through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.

Room.Name: A small path in the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. To the west there is a cave entrance. The path continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The cave is very dark.

ExtraDescription.Description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.
The irregular opening is eight feet wide and six feet tall. An acrid smell emanates from within.

Room.Name: Inside the cave
Room.Description: You are in a natural cave. Various sorts of debris cover the stone floor, emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the air thick and hard to breathe. The only obvious exit is east.

Exit.Description: The cave opening is to the east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It consists mostly of gnawed bones mixed with small pieces of torn fur.
Quite uninteresting.
Kind of transparent, but quite noticeable nevertheless.

Room.Name: On a small, grassy field
Room.Description: You are in a small, grassy field somewhere in the forest. The tall grass nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an almost wall-like thicket on all sides of the field. A small path leads south through the trees.

Exit.Description: The small path leads south in between the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees form a close thicket.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow trail winding its way between the enormous, grey trunks. The crowns of the trees must be very dense, as they leave the forest floor in utter darkness. The trail leads east and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow trail leads east to a somewhat lighter part of the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees whose grey trunks remind you of ancient pillars in a enormous, deserted hall. To the south, a frail path leads away from the trail.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides. Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are where the dusty trail bends, as to avoid conflict with a colossal trunk to the west. Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet. The trail leads east and south.

Exit.Description: You see a dark trail north.
The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. You feel as if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence. The path continues north and south.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom all around you. The path continues north and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A junction in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient grey trees tower above you on all sides. Paths lead east, south and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom all around you. The path continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides. The trail leads north and west and to the south, a frail path leads away from the trail.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides. The trail leads east and south. To the north, a narrow path leads away from the trail.

Exit.Description: The narrow path leads west between the giant trees.
The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
Some of the trunks to the west are covered in a thin, almost transparent substance. It looks like small threads woven carefully together.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way north-south between huge, ancient trees that loom ominously above you.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The path leads east - away from the trail.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom in all directions. The path continues south and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A junction in the deep, dark forest

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere. The path continues south and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Huge, ancient trees are on all sides. The path continues north and south.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: You feel as if they are watching you.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: On the river bank in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. To the south a fast river is flowing westwards through the forest. Ancient grey trees loom on both banks. The path continues north and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The river flows fast and strong. It is black or looks so in the gloom.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: bank banks tree trees trunk trunks
ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof above the dark river.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: Beginning of a bridge across the dark river
Room.Description: The path widens and becomes a trail or maybe even a road with as packed as it is. It seems well maintained and like it may receive heavy use. Trees still line the banks and block travel north and west. The river is not very fast here, and a lot of logs under the bridge seem to be slowing the flow even more. The river banks are covered with medium rocks, and the bed of the river looks like small pebbles worn smooth from the river through the passage of time.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

ExtraDescription.Description: The river flows fast and strong. It is black or looks so in the gloom.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: bank banks tree trees trunk trunks
ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof above the dark river.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Giant, grey trees loom ominously all around. The path continues east and south.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A junction on the river bank in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are by a junction where three paths meet. Ancient, grey trees seem to observe you silently you from all around. To the south a dark river flows from east to west through the forest. Paths lead north, east and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The river flows fast and strong. It is black or looks so in the gloom.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof above the dark river.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A dead end path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. The ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty roots. To the south a dark river flows from east to west. The only exit appears to be west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The river flows fast and strong. It is black or looks so in the gloom.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof above the dark river.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A small path on the river bank in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom everywhere. To the south you smell marsh gas. The path continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

ExtraDescription.Description: The river flows fast and strong. It is black or looks so in the gloom.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof above the dark river.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides. The trail leads north and west, and to the south a frail path leads away from the trail.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years. It is impossible to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.

Room.Name: A narrow trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way westwards just below huge sticky wires suspended like ropes between the trees. To the west the path seems to be completely covered in a giant web made from huge threads covered with glue. This place gives you the creeps.

Exit.Description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest, away from the web.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: substance wire wires rope ropes tree trees trunk trunks
ExtraDescription.Description: The sticky substance is hanging like ropes between the ancient trees, crossing the path just out of reach. It might be possible to climb one of the sticky trunks.

Room.Name: The spider web
Room.Description: You are walking along the narrow path, ducking under the sticky ropes as you advance... > A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! > The huge, poisonous spider stings you! You resist the poison! The huge, poisonous spider stings you! You are poisoned! The huge, poisonous spider stings you! You are poisoned! > You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!!!

Room.Name: Up in the tree
Room.Description: You are hanging on the outside of a huge tree trunk covered in a sticky substance. Directly to the west is an immense spider web suspended between numerous of the giant trees including the one you are hanging on.

Exit.Description: To the west is the immense spider web. It seems to move softly.
Downwards is the narrow forest path.

ExtraDescription.Description: The spider web stretches out to the west. It looks as if it is possible to walk on it.

Room.Name: On the spider web
Room.Description: You are balancing carefully on the giant sticky threads that holds the giant web in place. To the east is a giant tree trunk and to the west is an entrance to a cave-like structure made from many layers of spider web.

Exit.Description: To the east is the giant tree trunk.
To the west is the entrance to the cave-like structure.

ExtraDescription.Description: The immense spider web moves softly.
It covers a ground area corresponding to an irregular circle with a diameter of about 20 feet and is nearly 10 feet tall. It looks very old.

Room.Name: The Den of the Queen Spider
Room.Description: You are inside a cave-like structure that seems to be made entirely from countless layers of spider web. Temperature and humidity is very high making it hard to breathe the foul air that lingers here. The walls are covered with open cocoons.

Exit.Description: Compared to this place the east exit looks inviting.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sticky walls are covered with open cocoons.
The cocoons are burst open as if something inside really wanted to get out. They are at the size of a human head.

Room.Name: A dusty trail in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom all around you. The trail continues north and east.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail leads north through the trees.
The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.

Room.Name: A dusty trail in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere. The trail continues south and west. A broad irregular path leads eastwards away from the trail.

Exit.Description: The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.
The dusty trail leads south through the trees.
The dusty trail leads west through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: To the east the ancient grey giants have many marks as if something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.
The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.

Room.Name: At the end of the trail through the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom all around you. You see a dark grove north of you. The only other exit is east.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.

Room.Name: Outside a cave in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are at the end of a broad, irregular path. To the north is a very large ominous-looking cave opening. The trees here have many marks as if something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.

Exit.Description: The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.
The path winds its way westwards.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient grey giants have many marks as if something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.
The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.

Room.Name: The cave of the Green Dragon
Room.Description: You are in a big natural cave. The floor is littered with bones of all sorts and the stench is so massive that you could cut it with a knife. The only exit is to the south.

Exit.Description: The exit leads out into the forest.

ExtraDescription.Description: Most of the bones on the floor appear to be of human origin.

Room.Name: A small path in the deep, dark forest
Room.Description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere. The tree trunks here seem to be covered in some sticky substance. The path continues south and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The substance reminds you of giant threads covered with glue. If it had not been for the size you could have sworn it was part of a spider web.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail. One of the giant roots could probably crush it in a single blow.

Room.Name: The narrow trail.
Room.Description: This trail looks much spookier than any other thats you have seen. The usual animal claw marks and bites on the trees are getting far and few between. The trail continues north.

Exit.Description: the narrow trail continues north.
the trail intersects the main forest path.

Room.Name: The narrow trail.
Room.Description: This area of the trail is also very peculiar. You can see no signs of animal life what so ever. The structure of the surrounding trees forces the path to make a sharp turn to the east.

Exit.Description: the trail bends east.
the start of the trail.

Room.Name: The circle of trees.
Room.Description: The trees here seem to form a circle around a HUGE tree that is in the center of them. You notice a wooden door carved into the huge tree to the east. The trail that you followed to get here seems to end at the base of the tree.

Exit.Description: The tree door is carved beautifully.
the bend on the trail.

Room.Name: Inside the great tree.
Room.Description: You have stepped inside of this hollowed tree. From here steps lead down into darkness or you can exit the tree by going west.

Exit.Description: the door is carved beautifully.
The steps look appear like they will hold your weight.

Room.Name: The underground hallway.
Room.Description: This hallway is apparently one of the roots of the tree hollowed out. The hall leads south to a room where you hear strange noises or you can go up the steps.

Exit.Description: the hallway looks quite grand.
the steps appear like they will hold your weight.

Room.Name: The cultist temple.
Room.Description: This temple is built to some god that you don't worship. It is a nice place to visit but you feel very uncomfortable about spending much time here. The wooden altar seems almost to glow as you enter the room. The only exit is the way you came in.

Exit.Description: the hallway looks quite grand.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow path, its twists and turns leading you deeper into the heart of the dense forest. The ancient trees tower high above you, their verdant crowns interlocking to form a natural cathedral of green. Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues east and west, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow path, its twists and turns leading you deeper into the heart of the dense forest. The ancient trees tower high above you, their verdant crowns interlocking to form a natural cathedral of green. Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues east and west, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues north and south, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues east and south. There seems to be a cave to the north of here.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow path, its twists and turns leading you deeper into the heart of the dense forest. The ancient trees tower high above you, their verdant crowns interlocking to form a natural cathedral of green. Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues east and west, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues east and west, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You find yourself on a narrow path, its twists and turns leading you deeper into the heart of the dense forest. The ancient trees tower high above you, their verdant crowns interlocking to form a natural cathedral of green. Their thick branches cast a dappled light upon the forest floor, bathing the area in an ethereal and otherworldly glow. The path winds its way through the trees, the sound of crunching leaves and twigs beneath your feet the only sign of your progress. To either side, the forest presses in close, its underbrush and brambles lending a sense of mystery and danger to your journey. Ahead of you, the path stretches on, its course marked by the twists and turns of gnarled roots that burst through the earth. It continues east and west, a ribbon of light in an otherwise dark and enchanting world.

Room.Name: A trail through the dense forest
Room.Description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: Edge of a Dense Forest
Room.Description: The dense forest surrounds you with towering trees that reach for the sky, their branches intermingling overhead to form a thick canopy that blocks out much of the sunlight and casts deep shadows below. The ground beneath your feet is soft and spongy, covered in a carpet of fallen leaves and pine needles. Ferns and other undergrowth flourish in abundance, dotted with wildflowers that add pops of color to the lush green landscape. The air is thick with the fragrant scent of pine and damp earth, and the rustling of leaves and the chirping of insects fills the air with a tranquil hum.

Room.Name: Edge of a Dense Forest
Room.Description: The dense forest surrounds you with towering trees that reach for the sky, their branches intermingling overhead to form a thick canopy that blocks out much of the sunlight and casts deep shadows below. The air is thick with the fragrant scent of pine and damp earth, and the rustling of leaves and the chirping of insects fills the air with a tranquil hum.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: Still wide enough for boats to pass, yet the banks of the river are covered in tall grass and ferns, blocking your view beyond. Various trees and shrubs can also be seen, providing shade and food for a multitude of animals.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: Still wide enough for boats to pass, yet the banks of the river are covered in tall grass and ferns, blocking your view beyond. Various trees and shrubs can also be seen, providing shade and food for a multitude of animals.

Room.Name: River Bend
Room.Description: Still wide enough for boats to pass, yet the banks of the river are covered in tall grass and ferns, blocking your view beyond. Various trees and shrubs can also be seen, providing shade and food for a multitude of animals.

Room.Name: River Bend
Room.Description: Still wide enough for boats to pass, yet the banks of the river are covered in tall grass and ferns, blocking your view beyond. Various trees and shrubs can also be seen, providing shade and food for a multitude of animals.

The air is thick with the fragrant scent of pine and damp earth, and the rustling of leaves and the chirping of insects fills the air with a tranquil hum.

Room.Name: Within a Dense Forest
Room.Description: The dense forest surrounds you with towering trees that reach for the sky, their branches intermingling overhead to form a thick canopy that blocks out much of the sunlight and casts deep shadows below. The ground beneath your feet is soft and spongy, covered in a carpet of fallen leaves and pine needles. Ferns and other undergrowth flourish in abundance, dotted with wildflowers that add pops of color to the lush green landscape. The air is thick with the fragrant scent of pine and damp earth, and the rustling of leaves and the chirping of insects fills the air with a tranquil hum.

Room.Name: Inside A Massive Living Tree
Room.Description: You are in a legendary guild of rangers and woodsmen inside this massive living tree. The tree is said to be centuries old, with roots that spread far and wide, and a trunk so thick that it would take several people holding hands to encircle it. Within its walls, the guild members live and train, honing their skills in tracking, and survival. The interior of the tree is lit by glowing mushrooms and torches, and the air is filled with the scent of wood and earth.

Room.Name: Deep Within the Massive Living Tree
Room.Description: Deep within the heart of the giant living tree, there is a small, cozy room where the guildmaster awaits his students. The room is adorned with intricate wooden carvings and tapestries depicting woodland scenes, and the walls are lined with shelves holding various weapons, scrolls, and books. A large wooden desk sits in the center of the room, and behind it sits the guildmaster's chair, carved from a single piece of oak. The room is lit by flickering candles, giving it a warm and inviting glow. This is where the guildmaster interviews and advances his students, imparting his knowledge and wisdom upon them as they progress through the ranks of the guild. The air in the room is heavy with the scent of parchment and ink, and the sound of rustling leaves can be heard faintly in the background, reminding all who enter of the forest's presence.

NPC.name: john lumberjack
NPC.description: He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy, chequered shirt. His features are worn with hard work and his expression is one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.
NPC.longDescription: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.

NPC.name: bear
NPC.description: The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp teeth. It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.
NPC.longDescription: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.

NPC.name: rabbit
NPC.description: This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.
NPC.longDescription: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.

NPC.name: deer
NPC.description: She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.
NPC.longDescription: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.

NPC.name: fox
NPC.description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.
NPC.longDescription: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.

NPC.name: warg vicious
NPC.description: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur. Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs. It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
NPC.longDescription: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.

NPC.name: warg ferocious
NPC.description: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur. Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs. It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
NPC.longDescription: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.

NPC.name: wolf grey
NPC.description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
NPC.longDescription: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.

NPC.name: wolf black
NPC.description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
NPC.longDescription: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.

NPC.name: dragon green
NPC.description: This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its colossal body. Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does the nicks in the horns on its head. It smells as disgusting as only dragons do.
NPC.longDescription: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.

NPC.name: shargugh brownie
NPC.description: This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long tangled brown beard. He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if he is having great fun.
NPC.longDescription: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.

NPC.name: elder druid
NPC.description: The druid looks quite old. You would think him venerable, but you know he would be a tough foe.
NPC.longDescription: The elder druid is here ... he looks very upset at your presence in his home.

NPC.name: bunny rabbit
NPC.description: This rabbit is a small, furry animal with long hind legs and short front legs. It has a round, compact body and a short, fluffy tail. It has large, round ears that can move independently, and its eyes are situated on the sides of its head, giving it a wide field of vision. Its fur is soft and gray. It has large, strong hind legs that it uses for jumping and running, and sharp claws that it uses for digging burrows. It has large, flat teeth designed for chewing tough vegetation. Overall, this rabbit have a distinctive and recognizable appearance, with its soft, round body and long hind legs making it look both cute and nimble.
NPC.longDescription: A bunny rabbit hops around playfully.

NPC.name: Thalionorin Leafwhisperer ranger guildmaster
NPC.description: A tall, lean, and muscular figure with piercing green eyes, long curly brown hair, and dons a suit of green and brown leather armor. Thalionorin is a skilled master ranger, holding a staff made from the wood of this massive. He is wise and compassionate, with a deep love for nature and its balance. As guildmaster, Thalionorin trains and mentors new rangers while overseeing guild operations with a fair but firm leadership style, earning the respect and reverence of all who know him.
NPC.longDescription: Thalionorin Leafwhisperer, master of the rangers guild rests here waiting for the next student.

NPC.name: ranger guildguard guard
NPC.description: Dressed in green and brown leather armor adorned with nature-inspired designs, this ranger guard blends in seamlessly with the surrounding forest. The ranger is peaceful sort, preferring to use non-lethal means to subdue intruders whenever possible, using deadly force only as a last resort to protect the living tree and its guild members.
NPC.longDescription: The ranger guild guard is alert here, scanning the shadows and bushes for someone trying to sneak into the guild.

Item.Name: axe lumber two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a heavy axe of the kind lumberjacks use to chop down trees.

Item.Name: shirt
Item.LongDescription: A chequered shirt lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is an extra large, chequered shirt made from heavy cloth.

Item.Name: boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of leather boots lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They are fashioned from rough leather that has been oiled frequently to make it stay waterproof. They look worn but quite functional.

Item.Name: fireplace
Item.LongDescription: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is fashioned from stones of various sizes that have been stacked on top of each other and fastened with mortar. Its chimney is constructed likewise and leads the smoke out through the low cabin ceiling.

Item.Name: chest
Item.LongDescription: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened together with tenons. It is equipped with a simple brass lock.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small brass key lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

Item.Name: coins silver
Item.LongDescription: Some silver coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The coins seem to be gold. They are obviously valuable.

Item.Name: blackberries
Item.LongDescription: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look very tasty indeed.

Item.Name: mushroom
Item.LongDescription: A small mushroom grows nearby.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a tasty little thing.

Item.Name: water barrel
Item.LongDescription: A water barrel has been left here.

Item.Name: colossal tree
Item.LongDescription: A colossal tree blocks the way westwards.
Item.Description: This enormous tree must be a thousand years old. Its rough bark looks grey and pale and is decorated with scratches and claw marks. On its west side is a small opening just above ground level.

ExtraDescription.Description: The opening is far too narrow for you to squeeze through but it looks as if the tree is hollow.

Item.Name: branch
Item.LongDescription: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.
Item.Description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

Item.Name: branch
Item.LongDescription: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.
Item.Description: A long, grey branch looks like it could be wielded as a mace.

Item.Name: branch
Item.LongDescription: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.
Item.Description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

Item.Name: toadstool
Item.LongDescription: A large toadstool grows nearby.
Item.Description: It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds. The top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak, musty smell. Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

Item.Name: toadstool
Item.LongDescription: A large toadstool grows nearby.
Item.Description: It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds. It has small white spots and the top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak, musty smell. Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

Item.Name: potion yellow
Item.LongDescription: A yellow potion has been left here.
Item.Description: It has a deep yellow colour and and a strong spicy smell.

Item.Name: shield large
Item.LongDescription: A large round shield has been left here.
Item.Description: It is made from hard wood that has been reinforced with heavy iron bands

Item.Name: crown iron
Item.LongDescription: An iron crown rests on the ground.
Item.Description: It is a heavy human-sized crown made from solid iron.

Item.Name: ring iron
Item.LongDescription: An iron ring has been left here.
Item.Description: It is a quite heavy human-sized ring made from solid iron. It lacks decorations of any kind.

Item.Name: morning-star star morning
Item.LongDescription: The morning star is here collecting dust while it lies on the ground.

Item.Name: hollow
Item.Description: A hollow within the opening of the colossal tree appears to be home to a very small critter.

Item.Name: ring opal
Item.LongDescription: A ring of black opal lies here gathering dust.
Item.Description: It is a full circle of opal, smooth and simple

Item.Name: living staff
Item.ShortDescription: a ranger staff of living wood
Item.LongDescription: a staff of living wood lies here.
Item.Description: This staff is long and smooth, with intricate patterns etched into the wood that resemble the natural growth patterns of a tree. The wood is imbued with powerful magic that allows for communicate with animals and plants, heal injuries and ailments, and call forth the powers of nature to aid in battle.

Item.Name: living whip
Item.LongDescription: a whip of living vine lies here.
Item.Description: This whip is a remarkable weapon crafted from woven living vines that embody the magic of the forest. The whip is long and flexible, its braided vines forming a sturdy yet pliant structure that is perfect for close combat and long-range attacks. The vines seem carefully selected and harvested from a variety of plants within the forest, then meticulously braided together to form the whip. The living vines provide a natural grip, allowing the user to wield the weapon with great precision and dexterity.
